original_title: Systematic program to fix weaknesses in tax payment
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); State Minister of Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said a systematic program will be implemented to fix the existing weaknesses in tax payment and streamline the process.
Attending an event held in Ruwanwella on Sunday (28) morning, the State Minister said the plan will be presented to the President this week.
He added that a proposal to establish a separate court for tax-related matters is also among the proposals.
